title: Huge lag spikes since latest patch update
body:
Since the latest patch I'm gettin huge lag spikes, it's not my connection and it's happening on both EUW and NA for me

I've heard numerous people tell me the same thing is happening with them also??

replies.poster: L รณ k รฌ
replies.body:
Hi. this is the second time its happening to me after a new patch. the first time i reinstalled the game and it worked and same happend after the last patch. in game it works the first 2-5 mins then i get Ms spikes from out of this world everything freezes some times game crashes so i have to reconnect then same thing again after 1-5 mins. im 110% sure its nothing wrong with my internet connection because everything else works youtube, other games everything works except LoL. what is going on? i've been researching and seen aloooot of people have the same problems from 2 years back. please help me.

Regards.

i posted this in the wrong section but it has to do with this. i've had no problem playing on my internet before so idk whats wrong tbh. I really wanna play without lagg spikes and game crashing. :(
Yeah, it's definitely packet loss, I've tried all those quick fixes listed and nothing is helping?

I don't see any issues happening with the servers right now, but these kinds of issues are likely a problem with your connection reaching the game server.  League is always online, so connection issues are pretty common because networks can degrade or run into issues.  My suspicions are with packet loss, and you can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview to know for sure.  Let me know the results and we can go from there.
